alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:04PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pender and eastern Bladen Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 904 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cypress Creek, or 10 miles east of Wallace, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, White Stocking, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Maple Hill, Long Creek, Murray Town, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Willard, Kelly, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Montague, St. Helena, Atkinson and Watha. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 407. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
